Nightshift watches Scorponok.  He tries to remain calm and collected, actin=
g like a sly Decepticon.  Inside he was nervous.  If they found out his tru=
e faction he would clearly be done for.  His resemblence to Tucson's old fo=
rm was impecable, yet the only thing that separated him from Tucson was his=
 black paint job and his accent.  He had been manufactured using the same s=
pecs and the same programming.  Hopefully his configurations would not be f=
ound out.

" What?  What'reya lookn' at me like that for? I told ya everyth=
ing ya need ta know and if I was one of them I wouldn'tve done that would I=
?  Nope, not me, look, you guys can trust me, I'm a Decepticon, I may not b=
e able ta fly but I am one of you guys.  And thanks ta me ya now know that =
Tucson's got 'emself a hell of an upgrade.  No Autobot would give ya that k=
inda info."

He transforms back into SUV mode.

"C'mon, I got lots more inf=
o where that came from.  But I can't tell ya here.  We better get somewhere=
 private where I can give ya the entire scoop."

Again, his tires kick up d=
ust around Scorponok.

"My bad, my bad. Slag, might be time for me ta get n=
ew tires."

ng in to the room.

 eye in this guy. I'm heading to Trone Room"

shift as he sent a quick acknowledgement to

e said to Scourge, his face not revealing

Hydras will be here shortly, we can let

d."
>

y,

=
> Nightshift full on.
